channel.title: Random Pens on The ragasirtahk Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Random Pens on The ragasirtahk Blog

item.title: No Reason to Hide
item.description: I see the tears in your eyes I think there is no reason to hide Years passed by Moments evolved Into this time The silence Inaudible emotions Say it all Please speak up Open your heart There is much to say Forgetting is an art I see the tears in your eyes I think there is no reason to hide

item.title: You are the Light
item.description: How do I say What do I say You are the light Holding my sight When I met With that smile My heart was your At first sight Never to realise That was drifting Drifting us close Was that time I swear I will be there Everytime For you Not like a lover More like a soldier Supporting you From the distress Words fall short To thank you the most

item.title: Can I Get it All Back?
item.description: Can I get it all back? The mellow hi-s The beautiful smiles Can I get it all back? Petty fights Mischeivous eyes Those were the days Can I get it all back? The long talks Like adventurous walks Was the discovery of Beautiful life Can I get it all back? I never imagined For God’s sake It will all vanish Like things that perish More like a nightmare Say, separating in a fare

item.title: It's all About Choices
item.description: I am here Waiting for you You are there Waiting for him It’s all about choices My pen bleeds Inner voice seeps Mist on lenses Say it all It’s all about choices More like a dream Sweetest os the sweet Freezing speed of life You are there Not with me But happier with him ‘Cause it’s all about choices

item.title: That Particular Moment
item.description: I still recall That beautiful day You like a doll Mesmerized was I Lost was I Then you said hi That particular moment I looked for something cool As reply to you But I fumbled Weird as usual Then you smiled That particular moment Then the internet Sleepless nights Pinging nights Happy nights Missed you I When you said goodbye That particular moment I decided to Give you a gift

item.title: Tell Me Why
item.description: Sleepless nights Un-flown kites Is this love Tell me why? Fumbled talks Disastrous walks Looking for you Shying from you Is this love Tell me why? Things I blurt Taken as flirt Hidden feelings Fearing love Things are liked People are loved Is this love Tell me why? Regular risks Joyous frisks Is this love Tell me why? I am obsessed Rather over possessed They believe I am lost

item.title: So Strange
item.description: When I was young I used to believe People hide feelings It’s so strange I met you Eye met you The world whispered And I fumbled Grasping for words Easing me there Was that smile Frozen moments Void speed of life Tearing me apart Killing from within There was that feeling The feeling that I hide Now I understand Now I believe People hide feelings It’s not so strange.

item.title: Prisoner is I
item.description: Life is so strange Full of craze I thought it may be forgetful You proved it may be magical Love is unforgiving Prisoner is I Drifting in the sunshine Apricots and wine You and I Ever be my Love is unforgiving Prisoner is I Too many times I tried to hide Oh, love from thy But you let that chime Love is unforgiving Prisoner is I Full of peace

item.title: All for You
item.description: People have secrets My secret is you Every poet has a story My story is you God gives gifts He gave me you Love is power My power is you Dreams are beautiful Beautiful is you Worldly desires My desire is you People seek love I seek you Words are few To describe you Magic is now Thanks to you Oh, mother Oh, father I love you All this is for you.

item.title: I You
item.description: I be the man You be the girl I flip the pan You swing the curl You carry love I carry heart Beautiful dove Leads our cart 14 years Wonderful marriage You serve the platter I lead the carriage Lost in thoughts Don’t worry a lot I earn the notes You prepare the cot I may be weird But I’ll keep you cheered I may be ugly But I’ll keep you cuddly You say I flirt

item.title: It's You
item.description: It’s you Stuck in the cue Dreaming about things Fresh and new Will you get ahead Removing things Relishing memories Out of your head? This obsession Taking your possession Will they believe You deserved a mention? It gets harder Know not why Will they remember The magical time? It’s you As always Stuck in the cue Gloomy days They return.

item.title: Obsession
item.description: The world is obsession Obsession is you Your obsession They shall remember Leave a legacy They shall remember Live a life You will remember Higher dreams Stronger wings Hidden albatross Determined to succeed Life is a race Many a paths Keep the pace Choose your paths Your obsession You will achieve Your passion You will succeed Down the valley Up the hill You choose your way Up to the hill MTFBY.

item.title: First Time
item.description: The first time I saw you You had my sight Withheld by might And then you smile That first time I wondered why If anytime Will you talk? Will you walk? Beside me For first time The chain of Attraction Losing our Traction Were you Mine? That first time You wipe my Tears Forgiving my fears I ain’t feeble It’s just the past And you understood That first time Walking the dangers

item.title: You are the One
item.description: You are the one Oh, the reason for smile Love in the Californian drive The soul of my emptiness You are the one Yeah, you are the one You bring me to life Hope in the darkness For let the sunshine Remove the clouds Uplifting my soul You are the one Yeah, you are the one Counting the stars Those silly nights The petty fights The empty minds You are the one

item.title: I Swear
item.description: I swear I miss you The magical nights The 3 AM fights The promises of life I swear, Oh, I swear I still miss you High octane days My octave maze You were the guide Fighting my odds More like a torch I swear, Oh, I swear I still miss you Then the darker days The world’s odds I don’t know why Why you leave me I swear, Oh, I swear

item.title: Reason
item.description: Dear reason I was a bully A sadist You were a magic A beauty Dear reason I was quiet Hiding things Un-notified pings You were might Morphed me Oh, reason Life was history Love: uncovered mystery Hidden wisdoms Unspoken kingdoms Entered thy Morphing my Oh, reason Dear reason I am a supporter A lover You changed me Wow, reason Dear reason Neglected things Now magical Imagination wings Euphoria Beautiful now

item.title: Imaginary
item.description: I recall You did the talks Mystical walks Withholding me Imaginary? You were shy My heart’s pie Living me softly Sans efforts Imaginary? I was worn Heavenly light! I was blessed I lived Imaginary? That’s history More like mystery Unwept thoughts Remind me You were there Imaginary.
